description:
Everything integration for the Windows taskbar.

With EverythingToolbar you can instantly search files and folders by name directly in the Windows taskbar with Everything.
It allows quick and easy file indexing and fast searches.
Changes
- Fixed the search window not always opening in front of other windows (#635)
- Another possible fix for search results opening multiple times after EverythingToolbar has been running for a while (#638)
- Improved translations via Crowdin ðŸ’–
